tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmergencyResponsePersonnel (
  personnel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  certification_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  last_training_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE emergency_response_personnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(100),
    certification_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE training_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_id INT REFERENCES emergency_response_personnel(personnel_id),
    training_date DATE,
    training_type VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_id INT REFERENCES emergency_response_personnel(personnel_id),
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
)
